div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Appointment` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Appointment`. Element `Appointment` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment`.
Element `Appointment.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.meta`.
Element `Appointment.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.implicitRules`.
Element `Appointment.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.language`.
Element `Appointment.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.text`.
Element `Appointment.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.contained`.
Element `Appointment.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.identifier`.
Element `Appointment.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.status`.
Element `Appointment.cancellationReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.cancelationReason`.
Element `Appointment.class` is will have a context of Appointment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Appointment`.
Element `Appointment.serviceCategory` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.serviceCategory`.
Element `Appointment.serviceType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.serviceType`.
Element `Appointment.specialty` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.specialty`.
Element `Appointment.appointmentType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.appointmentType`.
Element `Appointment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.reasonCode`. Element `Appointment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.reasonReference`.
Element `Appointment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.reasonCode`. Element `Appointment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.reasonReference`.
Element `Appointment.priority` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.priority`.
Element `Appointment.description` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.description`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Appointment.replaces` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Appointment.replaces` is will have a context of Appointment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Appointment`.
Element `Appointment.virtualService` is will have a context of Appointment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Appointment`.
Element `Appointment.supportingInformation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Appointment.supportingInformation`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Appointment.previousAppointment` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Appointment.originatingAppointment` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Appointment.account` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
